review:
I got my Root Canal done and it went very well. Not a single pain killer not any antibiotics. 
The doctor was very friendly and explained me the process really well and calmed my nerves completely. The entire process was pain free. 

Would recommend Dr Pooja to anyone and everyone for any dental treatments.
